body:
NTR writer still understand NTR

its not stealing if the victim hasn't any partner

Ok, normally I don't mind if the dude has actually no relation with the girl since there no one to blame but himself, BUT unless the girl was looking for a excuse to fuck with the shad I fucking hate the stupid logic of "I will sacrifice myself for the X dude i barely know"(even if she knows the MC, its fucking stupid)
The "more like this" section for this doujin is so weird damn. Anyway good ntr, fapped to it as well too bad the megane beta ruined it a bit. Wished the author made more like this.

it can be a vanilla story but author is just playing with us by adding the phrase i will let u fck if u don't bully weaker guy.....seriously i think she likes him so she is letting him fck her author just forcefully turned it into ntr
This is just great. Decent art, ridiculous premise, incel mc and to top it all off it also has voyeurism. As my name suggests, I rate this a solid 7/10!
Yooo that megane-kun, i want puch him so bad fckng annoying
I like ntr. But this megane weak mc make me angry lma9
Haha girls like to easy, free pussy

bro this shit is so stupid. I don’t got a problem with Ntr, in fact I’ve fapped to it many times, and some of my favorites are ntr, but this is stupid. I’ve seen some bad characters but this takes the cake for the dumbest character I’ve ever seen.
this story makes no sense, if she can easily put him on his ass, why would she even accept? Just keep putting him on his ass until he learns...
Oh, so it's the old "I could get rid of this guy easily but instead i'll become his sex slave so he doesn't hurt the person i like" cliche...
Art is good, but its your basic plot.

Yikes.
This is kinda getting outta hand. Should seriously ban ntr from these doujin artists till they learn how to actually concoct an actual story lmao.

Shes stronger than him and has beaten him up before but gives herself up to protect this guy??
How is this ntr when they're not even lovers lmao
This is not about hating on NTR or anything but seeing as she can deal with him herself and still do this is such genuine stupidity. God such a shit story in terms of NTR
let's all enjoy the many genres of hentiey, fellow cartoon wankers ^_^
Believe me when I say netorare is the greatest genre of all time! Vanilla fags and beta cucks will keep crying about it lol
yawn another classic bully ntr story. good art tho
this one was good happens all the time someone has a crush on a girl all the while the girl getting railed like this
This was alright

the art is good but bruh, who tf think that having sex will stop bullying?
Eh pretty generic, art is decent though
This one is ok kinda dumb. You willing to have sex to stop bullying lol
so just stand there and watch your no worse then the idiot who bullied you he's scum just like him

This is not netorare. Netorare usually describes infidelity from a partner typically in the form of cheating physically and rarely emotionally. This thing here is a dude finding out his crush was fucking his bully. She can't even be called a slut because she's dealing with one dude and is just being dominated to do nasty shit. So... fuck this tag.
